sentences.en: Bruce's office is a corner one, utilitarian and unglamorous.
sentences.cn: 布鲁斯的办公室在角落里，实用而普通。

sentences.en: Finally I spotted it, in a dark corner over by the piano.
sentences.cn: 最后我在钢琴旁的阴暗角落里发现了它。

sentences.en: He appears to have backed himself into a tight corner.
sentences.cn: 他似乎已把自己逼入了困境。

sentences.en: He lit a cigarette and perched on the corner of the desk.
sentences.cn: 他点了一根烟，坐在桌角上。

sentences.en: He pulled a dirty handkerchief out by its corner and waved it at me.
sentences.cn: 他拽出一块脏手帕，捏着一角向我挥动。

sentences.en: He sat in the corner of a second-class carriage.
sentences.cn: 他坐在一节二等车厢的角落里。

sentences.en: He volleyed the ball spectacularly into the far corner of the net.
sentences.cn: 他一脚漂亮的凌空抽射，把球踢进了球门的远角。

sentences.en: He waited until the man had turned a corner.
sentences.cn: 他一直等到那个男人拐过街角.

sentences.en: His shoe had rucked up one corner of the pale rug.
sentences.cn: 他的鞋子把浅色地毯的一角弄皱了。

sentences.en: I was curled up on the floor in a corner sobbing hysterically.
sentences.cn: 我蜷缩在地上的某个角落，失声痛哭。

sentences.en: kids hanging around on street corners
sentences.cn: 在街角闲荡的小孩子

sentences.en: Outside, two old boys lingered on the street corner discussing cattle.
sentences.cn: 两个老头儿在外面街角迟迟不走，聊着牛的事情。

sentences.en: She flicked a crumb off the corner of her mouth.
sentences.cn: 她擦掉嘴角的面包屑。

sentences.en: She lives in a quiet corner of rural Yorkshire.
sentences.cn: 她居住在约克郡乡间一个僻静的地方。

sentences.en: The keys are in the back left-hand corner of the drawer.
sentences.cn: 钥匙放在抽屉里面左边一角。

sentences.en: The man with the umbrella turned the corner again.
sentences.cn: 拿伞的人又拐进了拐角处。

sentences.en: The photographer stopped clicking and hurried around the corner.
sentences.cn: 摄影师停止按动快门，匆匆绕过拐角。

sentences.en: there are Gaultier shops on every corner.
sentences.cn: 到处都有戈蒂埃商店。

sentences.en: There was an old piano in the corner of the living room.
sentences.cn: 在起居室的角落里有架旧钢琴。

sentences.en: there's a chemist round the corner.
sentences.cn: 附近有一家药店。

sentences.en: we need someone in the cabinet to fight our corner.
sentences.cn: 我们需要内阁有人维护我们的利益。

sentences.en: Write "By Airmail" in the top left hand corner.
sentences.cn: 在左上角写上“航空邮递”.

words.tran_cn: 有角的；被困得走投无路的
（美）玉米；（英）谷物；[皮肤] 鸡眼
腌；使成颗粒（corn的过去时和过去分词）
垄断；迫至一隅；使陷入绝境；把…难住

phrases.tran_cn: adv. 在拐角处；即将来临
圆角半径；刀尖圆弧半径；拐角半径
抄近路；以简便方法做事
维护某人的地位（或利益）
在角落里；处于困境；偷偷摸摸地；秘密的
在某人一方；支持（或鼓励）某人
在角落；在角落里；在拐角内

phrases.phrase: on (或 at 或 in) every corner

phrases.tran_cn: 在拐角处；即将来临；在附近

phrases.phrase: see someone/thing out of (或 from) the corner of on

trans.tran_en: the point at which two lines or edges meet

trans.tran_cn: 转弯，垄断，将…逼入死角，截住…与其说话
